title: Production shot from Essie Coffey’s My Survival as an Aboriginal
brief_description: In the late 1970s, Essie Coffey’s My Survival as an Aboriginal used the documentary form as a political act of resistance. Almost 30 years later, Rachel Perkins’ documentary First Australians continued to correct history and create change.
